titles.title: A resolution commending the Seattle Seahawks for winning Super Bowl XLVIII and the 12th Man for their critical support.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/12/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates: (1) the Seattle Seahawks for winning Super Bowl XLVIII; and (2) the Denver Broncos and quarterback Peyton Manning on a historic season.
